name: Lords of the Edge
description:
This is a quick and simple action game. The goal is to survive for five minutes as hordes of baddies swarm upon thee. This may sound like an impossible task, but you are a Lord of the Edge, or something like that. You have many tools at your disposal: bow and arrows, fireballs, meteors, goo traps, protection spells. Make judicious use of them.

If you survive, vast treasures await thee. But if you lose... well, at least you died heroically.

More content is planned. But for now, please enjoy. Thanks.
